tool_description: Creates a personalized daily and weekly hair care routine incorporating selected products, timing, and techniques based on hair needs and lifestyle constraints.

wash_frequency.description: How often hair will be washed

error_messages: Insufficient products: Need at least 2 products to build a routine
Too many products: Maximum 15 products can be incorporated into one routine
Invalid wash frequency: Wash frequency must be a valid option
Invalid time allocation: Morning and evening time must be positive integers
Empty styling goals: Must specify at least one styling goal
Empty hair concerns: Must specify at least one hair concern to address
usage: Provide your selected products, desired wash frequency, available time for morning and evening routines, styling goals, hair concerns, and lifestyle factors.

weekly_routine_schedule.description: Weekly treatments and deep care steps

product_usage_frequency.description: How often to use each product

routine_duration_estimate.description: Expected time commitment for the routine
